cause.description:
Are you tired of the world revolving around a few select individuals? What about the way that there have been more articles written about Paris Hilton going to jail in the past few days than the entire genocide in Darfur? The idea is to reject these icons who would purvey the notions that being rich is reason for nigh-on worship.
1. Reject those that would take importance from true crises.
2. Respect those that bring truth to the world
3. Know the difference between the two
cause.mission: get the idolatry off of the red carpet and back where it belongs
cause.name: Reject False Icons
